    • Method Detail

      • requestUrl

        public JSONObject requestUrl(String url,
                    JSONObject json)
        Does an HTTP request to the given url, GET or POST based on whether json was passed or not
        Parameters:
        url - the url to hit
        json - JSONObject with event item and iap verification json, if not null or empty then will POST to url
        Returns:
        JSONObject of the server response, null if request failed
